details:
This package installs only EiskaltDC++ with GUI based on Qt.

 EiskaltDC++ is a cross-platform program that uses the Direct Connect and ADC
 protocols. It is compatible with other DC clients, such as the original DC
 from Neomodus, DC++ and derivatives. EiskaltDC++ also interoperates with all
 common DC hub software.
 role::program, uitoolkit::qt, x11::application
